attributes.action: Force companies who dig up roads to work 24hrs non-stop until the job is done!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How many times have you been stopped by road works on the way to work with no-one working on the road? It seems that companies dig up a road, put up traffic lights and leave it for a couple of weeks then spend one day finishing their job. This must cost the country millions in lost time in arriving to our daily jobs late. There are not always warnings of impending road works either. Make it law that road works must be worked on 24hrs until completion to avoid prolonged congestion and eventually gridlock!
